titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF QUESTION - Mr. Frost asked unanimous consent that the question be divided so as to have a separate vote on the election of the Chaplain. Without objection, the question was divided and the House proceeded with the vote on election of the Chaplain.
On agreeing to the portion of the resolution electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Passed House without amendment. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Jeffrey J. Trandahl as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James M. Eagen, III as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
